UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial and hemolytic activities of crabrolin, a 13-residue peptide from the venom of the European hornet, Vespa crabro, and its analogs.
Literature.Author: Krishnakumari V, Nagaraj R

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 8530(MIC=15µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis(MIC=7.5µg/ml),Pseudomonas putida NC2102(MIC=90µg/ml),Escherichia coli W160-37(MIC=11µg/ml)
